articles.title: Emiliano Sala and pilot were overcome by toxic carbon monoxide from faulty exhaust before crash - Daily Mail
articles.description: Sala, 28, and pilot David Ibbotson, 59, died when their private single-engine Piper Malibu aircraft went down around 22 nautical miles north-west of Guernsey on January 21, 2019.
articles.content:
